thread.title: Hillary Clinton to Appear on Miley Cyrus-Hosted 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton to Appear on Miley Cyrus-Hosted 'Saturday Night Live'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Hillary Clinton to Appear on Miley Cyrus-Hosted 'Saturday Night Live'
text:
Comments Words are, the former First Lady will be a special guest in the 41st season premiere of the show, appearing in the opening scene. 
Hillary Clinton will drop by at studio 8H of Rockefeller Plaza this Saturday. The former Secretary of State is said to make an appearance in this coming episode of " Saturday Night Live " which will be hosted by Miley Cyrus . According to The New York Times, Mrs. Clinton will appear in the opening skit along with regular cast member Kate McKinnon, who has portrayed the former First Lady in previous episodes. NBC has declined a request for comment on the news. "SNL" returns for a 41st season Saturday, October 3. Cyrus is hosting the episode in addition to serving as musical guest. She appears in a newly released promo with Leslie Jones. In the video, Jones asks the former Disney darling, "Miley, I love your style! What's your secret?" The 22-year-old singer/actress replies, "You know that saying before you leave the house you should take off one accessory? Well I do that and then put like 17 more." Cyrus also shares some tips to get more likes on Instagram. "Nipple pasties and zit cream, like the combo of the two has gotten me a lot of likes," she tells the " Ghostbusters (2016) " actress.
